name: Cedar & Thyme Artisan Olive Crackers
description: Elevate your snack time with Cedar & Thyme Artisan Olive Crackers. Handcrafted in small batches using cold-pressed olive oil, sun-dried green olives, and a touch of wild thyme, these crackers deliver a savory Mediterranean flavor in every bite. Perfect for pairing with cheeses, dips, or enjoying solo, they are baked to a delicate crispness with no artificial flavors or preservatives. Ideal for entertaining or as a thoughtful gourmet gift, these crackers bring a taste of the Mediterranean coast to your table.

attributes.ingredients: Wheat flour, cold-pressed olive oil, sun-dried olives, wild thyme, sea salt, yeast
attributes.allergen_info: Contains wheat; may contain traces of sesame
